identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.description: A digital experience that feels like a high-end, modern physical library. Tactile, organized, and beautifully typographic. Rejects the generic 'SaaS Dashboard' aesthetic in favor of editorial clarity.

theme.instructions: Do not use pure #FFFFFF as the main background. Use the 'Bone' color (#F9F9F7) to create a reading-friendly environment. Use pure white only for input fields and content cards to create depth.

rules: Headings (h1-h3) must use Playfair Display. Use italics for emphasis keywords.
Body text must use Manrope. High legibility.
All data in tables (IDs, ISBNs, Dates, Status) must use JetBrains Mono.
Tracking: Headlines -> tracking-tight. Overlines -> tracking-widest uppercase.

global: Use sidebar navigation for the dashboard.
Main content area must have a 'paper' feel (white card on bone background).
Use 'Grid Borders' style: Visible 1px borders between grid items instead of gaps.
layout_strategy.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode B). Dense, data-rich but with breathing room.
table_view: - No vertical lines inside the table.

buttons.primary: bg-[#1B4D3E] text-white hover:bg-[#153D31] rounded-sm px-6 py-2 font-medium tracking-wide transition-all active:scale-95

cards.style: bg-white border border-[#E5E5E0] p-6 rounded-sm no-shadow

inputs.style: bg-[#F0F0EE] border-transparent focus:border-[#1B4D3E] focus:bg-white rounded-sm transition-colors font-mono text-sm

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update `tailwind.config.js` and `index.css` immediately with the Swiss Archive palette.
2. FONT SETUP: Import the Google Fonts in `index.css`.
3. LAYOUT: Create a `DashboardLayout` component that includes the Sidebar and the Main Content Area.
4. TABLE: Build a reusable `DataTable` component using the Swiss Style rules (no vertical dividers, mono font for data).
5. LOGIN: Use the `login_hero` image for a split-screen layout. Left side: Image (cover), Right side: Login Form.
6. MICRO-INTERACTIONS: Add `transition-all duration-200` to all interactive elements. Buttons should have a subtle active scale effect.
7. DATA-TESTID: Ensure EVERY interactive element (buttons, inputs, rows) has a `data-testid`.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients. Flat color is authoritative.
Do not center text unless it is a specific headline. Left align is the default for readability.
Use generous padding. A density of information does not mean cramped space.
